original: mu ga_@#/_/rig pa 'dzin ma rtshen ma'i rjes gnang
analyzed: mu ga_@#/_/rig pa 'dzin ma rtshen ma'i rjes gnang
translated: Permission for the Mother Who Holds the Skull Cup

original: bsgrub thabs bzhugs so//
analyzed: bsgrub thabs bzhugs so//
translated: The Sādhana is present.

original: @ga   // @#/_/gzhung du sin du ra'i phye mas gru bzhi pa'i  me dri mkha' spyod kyi byin brlabs byed na sa gzhi la chos
analyzed: @ga   // @#/_/gzhung du sin du ra'i phye mas gru bzhi pa'i  me dri mkha' spyod kyi byin brlabs byed na sa gzhi la chos
translated: In the text, if one performs the consecration of the fragrant incense square with Sindūra powder, one should make a dharma source in the center of the maṇḍala.

original: man+dal byas la/_de'i dbus su chu skyes 'dab ma brgyad pa'o 'byung pad+ma dang bcas pa 'di bris pa'i phyi rol du me ri bri/

translated: In the center of that, draw an eight-petaled lotus with a lotus. Outside of that, draw a ring of fire.🔽In the outer texts, this is drawn like this: If one draws a charnel ground in the center of the square,

analyzed: zhes 'byung dpe phyi rnams na 'di kha gda' ba/_sa gzhi gru spro na dur khrod bri/_de'i dbus su man ji kha slang ba'i steng

translated: on top of that, in the center of a dharma source anointed with sindūra, draw the form of the goddess.🔽Outside of that, draw the eight charnel grounds.

original: bri/_mtha' ma mchod pas
analyzed: bri/_mtha' ma mchod pas
translated: Outside of that, draw the outer perimeter.

translated: He is drawn here in the form of the manifestation of the goddess.🔽This is the chapter of the tantra.

analyzed: @##/_/'di rgyud tshhig yin de la _yang dag par bshad par bya ste/_'bum
translated: It is to be explained correctly:🔽From the three hundred thousand

analyzed: pa'i rgyud las sgyu ma chen mo rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i ming gi rnam grangs ral pa gyen brdzes zhes

original: rnal 'byor ma kar mo sogs spro zhing kun tu bsdud pa'i lus can ma/_man da ra ba dang / mya ngan med pa dang /_'dir bstad na sems can gyi don mi 'grub pas nam mkha' kun tu rgyu bar bya'o zhes🔽sems skyed pa'o/_/yongs 'du rnams skye bar gyur pa'i rin po che brtshegs pa'i khang
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma kar mo sogs spro zhing kun tu bsdud pa'i lus can ma/_man da ra ba dang / mya ngan med pa dang /_'dir bstad na sems can gyi don mi 'grub pas nam mkha' kun tu rgyu bar bya'o zhes sems skyed pa'o/_/yongs 'du rnams skye bar gyur pa'i rin po che brtshegs pa'i khang
translated: “Since I will not accomplish the welfare of sentient beings if I stay here, I will move through the sky in all directions.”🔽Thus she generates the mind of awakening.🔽She should visualize herself entering the jeweled house of the assembled wish-fulfilling trees.🔽Om is Vajravārāhī.

original: par rab tu 'jug par bdag nyid bsgom par bya'o/_/om bam rdo rje phag mo'o/_/
analyzed: par rab tu 'jug par bdag nyid bsgom par bya'o/_/om bam rdo rje phag mo'o/_/
translated: Hum is Yoginī.🔽Hrīḥ is Moher.🔽Hrīḥ hrīḥ is Universal Shaker.

original: ham yo gshin rje ma'o/_/hri mo rmongs byed ma'o/_/hri hri kun tu bskyod ma'o/_/
analyzed: ham yo gshin rje ma'o/_/hri mo rmongs byed ma'o/_/hri hri kun tu bskyod ma'o/_/
translated: Hum hum is Universal Terrifyer.

original: hum hum kun tu skrag ma'o/_/phat phat gtum mo yan lag thams cad la mtshhon cha'o//
analyzed: hum hum kun tu skrag ma'o/_/phat phat gtum mo yan lag thams cad la mtshhon cha'o//
translated: Phaṭ phaṭ is Caṇḍālī, the weapon on all limbs.

original: lte ba dang snying ka dang /_de bzhin du kha dang /_mgo bo dang /_spyi bos ste
analyzed: lte ba dang snying ka dang /_de bzhin du kha dang /_mgo bo dang /_spyi bos ste
translated: The navel, the heart, and likewise the mouth, the head, and the crown🔽are the weapons.

original: 'di mtshhon cha'o/_/rnal 'byor ma lnga po rang 'dra'i rigs lnga'i rnal 'byor pa nam mkha' gang bar spro
analyzed: 'di mtshhon cha'o/_/rnal 'byor ma lnga po rang 'dra'i rigs lnga'i rnal 'byor pa nam mkha' gang bar spro
translated: The five yoginīs emanate as the five families, yogins like themselves, filling the sky.

original: rig pa 'dzin ma rtshen ma'i rjes gnang bsgrub thabs bzhugs so//
analyzed: rig pa 'dzin ma rtshen ma'i rjes gnang bsgrub thabs bzhugs so//
translated: The permission for the knowledge-woman dakini

original: 'di rnams rdo rje sems dpar bde chen gyi ngo bor bshad do/_/rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i🔽go cha bgos la rang bzhin gyis bskyed pa'i gang zag dbang po rab la dgongs pa'i gzhan du na dgos
analyzed: 'di rnams rdo rje sems dpar bde chen gyi ngo bor bshad do/_/rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i go cha bgos la rang bzhin gyis bskyed pa'i gang zag dbang po rab la dgongs pa'i gzhan du na dgos
translated: These are explained as Vajrasattva in the essence of great bliss.🔽The armor is donned.🔽The offering of the torma is not necessary.🔽The offering of the mind is made.

original: so gtor ma rdzas dngos mi dgos bsam pa tsham sbyin par bya'o/_/om shri he ru ka ma ha badza a
analyzed: so gtor ma rdzas dngos mi dgos bsam pa tsham sbyin par bya'o/_/om shri he ru ka ma ha badza a
translated: oṃ śrī heruka mahāvajra

original: kad+ha ya a kad+ha ya pra be sha ya pra be sha ya to sha ya to sha ya sarba da ki ni rgo hri da yi
analyzed: kad+ha ya a kad+ha ya pra be sha ya pra be sha ya to sha ya to sha ya sarba da ki ni rgo hri da yi
translated: akaddhaya akaddhaya praveśaya praveśaya toṣaya toṣaya sarva dakini rakṣa hṛdaya🔽huṃ phaṭ

original: hum phat/_om sarba shud d+ha da ki ni pra ti_tsh+tshhe ba ba hum om/_om badzra da ki ni
analyzed: hum phat/_om sarba shud d+ha da ki ni pra ti_tsh+tshhe ba ba hum om/_om badzra da ki ni
translated: oṃ sarva śuddha dakini pratiṣṭha heva bhava huṃ oṃ🔽oṃ vajra dakini prati miva jita huṃ huṃ🔽oṃ ratna dakini prati miva jita huṃ traṃ

original: pra ti_mi ba dzi hum hum/_om rad na da ki ni pra ti mam ba dzi hum tram/_om pad+ma da
analyzed: pra ti_mi ba dzi hum hum/_om rad na da ki ni pra ti mam ba dzi hum tram/_om pad+ma da
translated: oṃ padma dakini prati miva jita huṃ hriḥ🔽oṃ karma dakini prati miva jita huṃ aḥ

original: ki ni pra ti_tsh+tshhe ba ba li hum hri/_om bi shwa da ki ni pra ti_tsh+tshhe ba ba li hum ah/_o🔽sarba yo gi ni pra titsh+tshhe mam ba lo hum hum ha ha hi tihdzah_bam hoh/_o badzra yo gi n+ya
analyzed: ki ni pra ti_tsh+tshhe ba ba li hum hri/_om bi shwa da ki ni pra ti_tsh+tshhe ba ba li hum ah/_o sarba yo gi ni pra titsh+tshhe mam ba lo hum hum ha ha hi tihdzah_bam hoh/_o badzra yo gi n+ya
translated: Oṃ viśva dakini prati tsaṃ heva pālī huṃ aḥ.🔽Oṃ sarva yogini prati tsaṃ he maṃ pālī huṃ huṃ ha ha hi tih jaḥ vaṃ hoḥ.🔽Oṃ vajra yoginī ya samaya stvaṃ dṛbya rakṣa rakṣa hoḥ.

original: ya sa ma ya ste dri byu rak+sha rak+sha ho/_rig pa 'dzin ma'i rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i
analyzed: ya sa ma ya ste dri byu rak+sha rak+sha ho/_rig pa 'dzin ma'i rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i
translated: The Means of Accomplishment of Vajrayoginī, the Knowledge Bearer

original: sgrub thabs so//_// rgya gar gyi mkhan po dza ya zhabs dang /_btshun pa dar ma yon tan gyis🔽bsgyur ba'o//_mi // las dang po pa yin zhing spros pa la dga' na om shri he ru ka zhes pa nas hri
analyzed: sgrub thabs so//_// rgya gar gyi mkhan po dza ya zhabs dang /_btshun pa dar ma yon tan gyis bsgyur ba'o//_mi // las dang po pa yin zhing spros pa la dga' na om shri he ru ka zhes pa nas hri
translated: Translated by the Indian abbot Jayabhadra and the🔽editor Dharma-kīrti🔽If you are a beginner and enjoy elaboration, you should also recite the mantra from “Oṃ śrī heruka” up to “hrīḥ ḍāka.”

original: da yam zhes pa yan chad kyi sngags kyang bzlas/_man ngag du gsungs te phyag len mi mdzad chang
analyzed: da yam zhes pa yan chad kyi sngags kyang bzlas/_man ngag du gsungs te phyag len mi mdzad chang
translated: This is taught in the esoteric instructions, but it is not practiced.

original: dang sha dang zan la sogs pa'i gtor ma bshams la lag pa g.yon pas reg la yi
analyzed: dang sha dang zan la sogs pa'i gtor ma bshams la lag pa g.yon pas reg la yi
translated: Arrange the bali offerings of beer, meat, bread, and so on. Touch them with your left hand and imagine that they are the five meats and five elixirs.

original: ge gsum sam b+ha ra'i ba ling cho ga 'am spyi gtor sogs cho ga gzhan gyis kyang gtub gsung gong gi sngags gcig pu 'am🔽'og gi dang sbrel ba bya'o ji ltar 'dod pas bzlas pas bdud rtshir bsams la/_mkha'
analyzed: ge gsum sam b+ha ra'i ba ling cho ga 'am spyi gtor sogs cho ga gzhan gyis kyang gtub gsung gong gi sngags gcig pu 'am 'og gi dang sbrel ba bya'o ji ltar 'dod pas bzlas pas bdud rtshir bsams la/_mkha'
translated: It is also suitable to do this with the other rites, such as the rite of the bali offering of the three syllables or the general bali offering.🔽As one recites the mantra as much as one likes, one imagines that the dakinis are summoned.

original: 'gro ma rnams mngon sum du dmigs la sngags rnams kyis dbul/_gzhan du na
analyzed: 'gro ma rnams mngon sum du dmigs la sngags rnams kyis dbul/_gzhan du na
translated: One should visualize the dakinis in actuality and offer the mantras.🔽It is not necessary to do anything else.

translated: One should also touch and recite the armor at those places.🔽I, the upasaka Drakpa Gyaltsen, received this from the Indian pandits Maitripa,🔽the pandit of Malava, the guru Alokisvara,🔽and Saparivara Amitabha,

original: badzra li la ya badzra khang gsar ba slob dpon lo tsha ba dge bsnyen grags pa rgyal mtshhan bdag gis nos so/_/'di man
analyzed: badzra li la ya badzra khang gsar ba slob dpon lo tsha ba dge bsnyen grags pa rgyal mtshhan bdag gis nos so/_/'di man
translated: and from the Indian abbot Lottsa,🔽and from the upasaka Drakpa Gyaltsen.🔽This is unbroken.🔽I received it from Shakya Rakshita,🔽Kanakashi,🔽and Jayalena,

original: chad med pas gtub shakya rak+shi ta/_ka na ka shi#/_dza ya le na/_phyis rgya gar du
analyzed: chad med pas gtub shakya rak+shi ta/_ka na ka shi#/_dza ya le na/_phyis rgya gar du
translated: and later in India from

analyzed: byon nas bla ma a nyid la gsan phyis mi tri ba nyid kyi slob ma ka ma la badzra bya ba la bla ma khang gsar bas
translated: He went to India and studied under the guru himself. Later, he studied under Kamalarakṣita, a disciple of Mitrayogi.
